item.title: Blog #5: STEM Meat
item.description: I’m now a registered mechanical engineering major.

item.title: Blog #7: Barbie Dreamhouse Imagination
item.description: Writing is bleeding onto the page and I have low iron.

item.title: Essay #4 Part #1: Web Design Notes
item.description: I wrote this complaint about bloated web design for the temple race car club marketing department. I want to publish it properly but it still feels unfinished. I've authored it as a dangling part one to represent that.

item.title: Essay #4 Part #2: Typography
item.description: I like typography but I’m not trying to make that anybody’s problem.
